original_text: I will give you even more than this. I will make you rich and famous, even though you did not ask for that. As long as you live, there will be no other king who is greater than you.
korean_text: 내가 또 네가 구하지 아니한 부귀와 영광도 네게 주노니 네 평생에 왕들 중에 너와 같은 자가 없을 것이라

sentences.original_text: I will give you even more than this.
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 너에게 이것보다 더 많은 것을 주겠다.

sentences.original_text: I will make you rich and famous,
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 너를 부유하고 유명하게 만들 것이며,

sentences.original_text: even though you did not ask for that.
there will be no other king
